attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is a dog that has been helping the Military in Basra and when the troops pull out he will be left there,probably to die! He must be allowed to return to the UK with the Troops he has served alongside

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Save Sandbag the Dog."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20246


Prime Minister's Office
